channel.title: Ordering Axoloti Core
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
I saw in the Core page that it is currently out of stock. I was wondering if there is a plan to make it available again or if there is a way to build it as a diy progects.
Thanks in advance, Andrea

item.title: Ordering Axoloti Core
item.dc:creator: @lab77 Justin Byrnes
item.description:
@lab77 wrote:

I have a couple Axoloti cores up for sale on Reverb (shipping in the USA) if anyone is looking. One has the Music Thing Modular AxoControl mod.

Read full topic

item.title: Ordering Axoloti Core
item.dc:creator: @axoman
item.description:
@axoman wrote:

Damn it, Johannes, now no one will buy my £200 Axoloti.
But at least you never announced it before my deadline, so I am still your friend

I don't know what's wrong with people these days, they must have really bad taste or something. The £200 "pre-owned-by-axoman-axoloti" was a real bargain!

To be honest, I was expecting Brasso, Jaffa, Smashed Transistors, or Strum to snap it up cause I happen to think they're my biggest fans!

- Axoman

Read full topic

item.title: Ordering Axoloti Core
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

New stock is expected in one or two weeks, I hope to get a production schedule tomorrow.

Thanks for your patience!

Read full topic

item.title: Ordering Axoloti Core
item.dc:creator: @axoman
item.description:
@axoman wrote:

Just a heads-up:

I'll make a point to check the forum at least once per day until Friday 29th September 2017, but after that I'll have to remove the offer cause I'll be too busy for a while.

So the offer is in effect only until midnight GMT Friday 29th September 2017.
I'm surprised it hasn't sold yet, actually!

Read full topic

item.title: Ordering Axoloti Core
item.dc:creator: @axoman
item.description:
@axoman wrote:

I've decided to sell my Axo if anyone's interested. It's 100% as new, and I doubt it's even been switched-on for a day in total. Comes exactly as Johannes sent it to me, same box, same packet, same packing.

The price is £200 to be paid via PayPal (in GBP). I'll rush it out to you using courier as soon as payment has cleared, so if anyone is interested, let me know.

Why is it so expensive?

Well, you get to say you own an Axoloti that was once owned by the one and only axoman!
Plus, I need the cash
.
.
.

Q&A:

Q: Hey axoman, will you accept offers and do me a discount?
A: No.

Q: Hey axoman, aren't you a psycho?
A: Yes, so that will likely increase the value of the Axoloti you buy from me if I kill someone!

Q: Hey axoman, so does this mean you've given-up on Axoloti?
A: No, silly, it just means I need as much cash as I can get right now cause I'm moving!

Q: Hey axoman, will owning a pre-owned-by-axoman Axoloti, improve my luck with the ladies?
A: It might do if they knew who I was, but I cannot guarantee it.

Read full topic

item.title: Ordering Axoloti Core
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Axoloti Cores are produced in batches, and when they run out (or i guess slightly before ) Johannes has to order various components, some times the lead times can be longer than expected ... or supplier might not be clear on the delivery date of components. Johannes, can then be a bit reluctant to comment on when his going to ship, as its not in his hands.
... if he is not replying, this might be the current situation - no worries, it will be happening behind the scenes

Read full topic
